qas.question: Literature gives the reader insights into what areas of its characters?
How does literary fiction aid the person who reads it?

answers.text: It benefits the psychological development and understanding

qas.question: What writer's entry in "The English Journal" was concerned with young adult fiction?
Why did this author embrace young adult literature as a grownup?

answers.text: to re-experience the emotional psychology she experienced as a child

qas.question: How did the writer refer to this psychological state experienced as a youth?
What gives readers access to physical aspects of a character?
D. Michael wrote an entry about young adult fiction in what publication?
Accessing emotional aspects of a character benefits the philosophical development and what else?

plausible_answers.text: the author utilized young adult literature in order to re-experience the emotional psychology she experienced as a child

qas.question: What did D. Michael explain in "The English Journal?"
Who wrote an entry in "The Journal English?"
Who utilized adult literature to access an emotional experience?

plausible_answers.text: It benefits the psychological development and understanding of the reader

qas.question: How does literature benefit emotional states?
